sect2.title: Rearrange Colormap
sect2.para: This command allows you to re-organize colors in the palette of indexed images. It doesn't modify the image. You can't add or remove colors; for that, see The Indexed Palette Dialog.

note.para: If your image is not indexed, this command is disabled.

sect3.title: Activating the Dialog
sect3.para: You can access this command in two ways:

listitem.para:
from the main menu:
Colors Map Rearrange Colormap .

from the Colormap Dialog using the right-click context menu
Rearrange Colormap .

sect3.title: Using the Rearrange Colormap dialog
sect3.para: You can drag and drop colors using the mouse to rearrange the colormap. You can sort colors based on Hue, Saturation and Value by using the buttons. You can also reverse or reset the order of the colors.
